title: Rename branding to QuickBazar and generate/replace app logo

requirements.text: Rename the app branding from “ShopHub” to “QuickBazar” across all visible UI and app metadata (including the top navigation brand text, HTML title, PWA manifest name/short_name, and Apple web app title meta tag). Use “QuickBazar” (no space) consistently.

quotes: is app ka naam Quick bazar rakh dijiye
is app ka rename  karna hai shophub ko change karke QuickBazar kar dijiye logo hata kar koi achha sa logo laga dijiye
aap apne according logo bana dijiye

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation brand text shows “QuickBazar” instead of “ShopHub”.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest uses “QuickBazar” for name/short_name (and does not mention “ShopHub” or “Marketplace”).
A case-insensitive search in the frontend codebase shows no remaining user-facing “ShopHub” branding.

requirements.text: Remove the existing header logo image reference (currently /assets/Colorful Illustrative Online Shop Logo.jpg.jpeg) and replace it with a newly generated QuickBazar logo asset stored under frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: ...logo hata kar koi achha sa logo laga dijiye
aap apne according logo bana dijiye

acceptanceCriteria: TopNav no longer references /assets/Colorful Illustrative Online Shop Logo.jpg.jpeg.
TopNav renders the newly generated logo image from /assets/generated/ and the image alt text is updated to “QuickBazar logo”.
Logo renders crisply on mobile and desktop without layout shift (no stretched or pixelated appearance).

requirements.text: Update PWA icon assets to match the new QuickBazar branding by regenerating the existing icon files referenced by the manifest (keep the same filenames/paths so the manifest references remain valid).

quotes: ...logo hata kar koi achha sa logo laga dijiye
aap apne according logo bana dijiye

acceptanceCriteria: The following existing files are replaced with newly generated QuickBazar-branded icons while keeping the same filenames and dimensions: pwa-icon.dim_192x192.png, pwa-icon.dim_512x512.png, pwa-maskable.dim_512x512.png, apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest continues to reference the same icon paths under /assets/generated/ and installs successfully as a PWA.
On iOS/Android “Add to Home Screen”, the installed icon shows the updated QuickBazar design (not the old icon).

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui must not be edited; compose them instead.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: No changes to backend canister logic, data models, or authorization.
No changes to routing structure or role-based access behavior beyond branding text/icon updates.

required: Distinct, modern marketplace logo mark with bold typography and vibrant colors on transparent background (quickbazar-logo.dim_512x512.png)
App icon, rounded-square marketplace symbol with vibrant background and the same visual identity as the logo (pwa-icon.dim_512x512.png)
App icon, rounded-square marketplace symbol with vibrant background and the same visual identity as the logo (pwa-icon.dim_192x192.png)
Maskable app icon, centered symbol with safe padding and solid/vibrant background matching the logo identity (pwa-maskable.dim_512x512.png)
Apple touch icon, rounded-square symbol matching the logo identity (apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)
